Functions

Function(s) admin.delete_old_ordersupplierevaluationdo.
To be used as Database Job. Delete at max "batchsize" old supplier evaluations and their history that are older than "days2keep". This deletion is done for all possible OrderSupplierEvaluationDO status("OrderSupplierEvaluationDO"."stateRef") To prevent the deletion of possible pending evaluations the configuration parameter days2keep must not be less than 7 days. example: select admin.delete_old_ordersupplierevaluationdo('{"days2keep": 183, "batchsize": 5000}');

FUNCTION admin.delete_old_ordersupplierevaluationdo ( config json ) RETURNS integer LANGUAGE 'plpgsql' volatile;
